title: Alex Calderoni
text:
Alex Calderoni (born 31 May 1976) is an Italian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who currently plays for <a href="A.P.D.%20Ribelle%201927">A.P.D. Ribelle 1927</a>.
Career.
Calderoni joined <a href="F.C.%20AlzanoCene%201909">Alzano</a> in a <a href="co-ownership%20%28football%29">co-ownership deal</a> in 1998. In 2000 Calderoni was acquired by Atalanta from Cesena. He was immediately left for Serie B club <a href="Ravenna%20Calcio">Ravenna</a> in a temporary deal.
On 31 August 2007 Calderoni joined <a href="Treviso%20F.B.C.%201993">Treviso</a> for €200,000 transfer fee. (with additional €30,000 other cost occurred for Treviso)
In 2008 Calderoni joined <a href="Torino%20F.C.">Torino F.C.</a>.
In January 2011 Calderoni was re-signed by <a href="A.C.%20Cesena">A.C. Cesena</a> in a temporary deal.
